name: X-Editable-ACF
tagline: In-line editing of Advanced Custom Fields in WordPress using X-Editable.
body: # X-Editable ACF X-Editable ACF is a (developer-focused) plugin that allows front-end editing of Advanced Custom Fields in WordPress. ## Installation * Install and activate plugin * Add theme support in functions.php using add_theme_support('x-editable-acf'); (see main plugin loader file) ## Documentation In progress (but don't hold your breath). However, the PHP files are pretty well-documented, if I may say so myself. ## Features * Edit Advanced Custom Fields from the front-end * Currently supports the following fields: 1. Text 2. Textarea 3. Date-picker 4. Taxonomy 5. Number 6. True/False 7. Select * Options for displaying a label, values as ul, and more * Template tags for easy theme integration ## Contributing Everyone is welcome to help contribute and improve this project. Suggestions & money are welcome. ## Support None provided
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
